Method Detail

draw

public javax.swing.JLabel draw(Card card,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               int index,
                               boolean grey)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Draws a card to the given container.

Parameters:
card - The card to draw
x - Place of image on the x-axis
y - Place of image on the y-axis
index - Where to put the image in the container. Used to determine which image will be visible if two images are on top of each other
grey - if true, draws the grey version of the card
Returns:
The JLabel-object in which the image is placed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If the card picture isn't found.
